name: Grilled turkey with Honey sauce, Fried plantain and dirty rice
description: Delight in our succulent grilled turkey, expertly marinated and char-grilled to achieve a perfect smoky flavor, then drizzled with a sweet and tangy honey sauce. Accompanied by crispy fried plantains that provide a delightful crunch, this dish is further enhanced by our signature dirty rice, a flavorful blend of spices, vegetables, and herbs. Each element harmonizes beautifully, creating a satisfying and memorable main course.

name: Shredded Beef with Garri Balls Soup
description: Begin your dining experience with a hearty bowl of shredded beef soup, featuring tender, slow-cooked beef thatâ€™s rich in flavor. This comforting dish is paired with delightful garri balls, adding a satisfying texture that complements the warm, savory broth. A symphony of spices elevates each spoonful, making it a perfect start to your meal.
